properties.command: bash -lc 'cd=$(pwd -P); if git rev-parse --is-inside-work-tree >/dev/null 2>&1; then root=$(git rev-parse --show-toplevel); rel=${cd#$root}; if [ -z "$rel" ]; then basename "$root"; else printf "%s%s" "$(basename "$root")" "$rel"; fi; else if [ "$cd" = "$HOME" ]; then echo " "; elif [[ "$cd" == "$HOME"/* ]]; then echo " ${cd#$HOME}"; else IFS="/" read -ra parts <<< "$cd"; count=${#parts[@]}; if [ $count -gt 3 ]; then echo "/${parts[1]}/  /${parts[$count-1]}"; else echo "$cd"; fi; fi; fi'

bash -lc 'if git rev-parse --is-inside-work-tree >/dev/null 2>&1; then branch=$(git branch --show-current 2>/dev/null); if [ -n "$branch" ]; then len=${#branch}; if [ $len -gt 20 ]; then truncated="${branch:0:20}"; ellipsis=$(printf ""); branch="$truncated$ellipsis"; fi; if ! git diff --quiet 2>/dev/null || ! git diff --cached --quiet 2>/dev/null; then color="#cc6666"; else color="#808080"; fi; printf "<%s> %s</>" "$color" "$branch"; fi; fi'
